PersonalStatement.text: Amber Luna, born on 1965-04-04, is a Female based in Michelleton, Estonia. She is Divorced and holds Laotian nationality. Currently working at Winters PLC.

WorkExperience.text: Marketing Specialist at Thomas, Mcguire and Davis from 2012 to 2018.
Senior Project Manager at Winters PLC, 2022 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Bachelor's in Marketing from University of Rhode Island
Master's in Engineering from University College Dublin

PersonalSkills.text: Problem-solving: Skilled in troubleshooting and optimizing complex systems.
Leadership: Proven track record of managing cross-functional teams.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, she enjoys playing tennis.
